bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Jose R. Andreu, May 16, 1947

div1.p: Hench sends Andreu a letter, to which he would like a reply before meeting with the Rockefeller Foundation.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Jose R. Andreu, May 16, 1947
div1.opener:
Received no reply
May 16, 1947
Dr. Jose R. Andreu
Minister of Public Health and Social Assistance
Republic of Cuba
Havana, Cuba
My dear Doctor Andreu:
div1.p:
Would it be possible for you to give me
some sort of an answer to the enclosed letter--
your answer to be in my hands before June 1st? I
am attending the Meeting of the American Medical
Association in Atlantic City and thereafter will
spend three or four days in New York. I will try
to contact the Rockefeller Foundation or some mem-
ber of the Rockefeller family in behalf of the
project. Therefore, I would very much like to hear
from you before then.

I enclose a reprint which may interest
you.
div1.closer: Very sincerely, P. S. Hench, M. D. PSH:alp
